parameters.description: Array of parameters for which the covariance equation has to be generated.

items.description: Parameter name, can be any of the available parameters in the universe parameters book.

values.description: Array of a-priori values for the parameters. Must have the same size as 'parameters'.

items.description: A-priori value for a parameter. The value must be consistent with default SI units used in GODOT.

covariance.description: Upper triangle of a-priori covariance matrix packed in vector format (column-major order) for the given 'parameters' of size N*(N+1)/2 where N is the parameter vector size.

items.description: Covariance matrix element. The value must be consistent with default SI units used in GODOT.
